title: Easy Commands Remix
description:
Tired of trawling through your inventory every time you switch grenades or pop a tonic? Easy Commands adds shortcut menus for applying tonics, and changing your equipped grenade.

To use, visit Key Mappings after installing the mod and bind keys for the new options in the Easy Commands section. Bad Mojo is partial to Shift+G, and Shift+T, but you do you.

Works with older saves.

(For this mod I have repaired the breakages in Bad Mojo's original mod and made it work for Caves of Qud 1.0)

1.1 - Removed the "recoilers" bind because the game now lets you bind a key directly to the existing Recoil ability from the Ability menu
